name: setup-sda
description: Minimalist setup scripts for the JavaScript library simple-data-analysis.

scripts.publish-patch: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && deno publish --dry-run && npm version patch && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish
scripts.publish-minor: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && deno publish --dry-run && npm version minor && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish
scripts.publish-major: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && deno publish --dry-run && npm version minor && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish

author: nael.shiab@gmail.com
